messages.subject: intimidation by books
messages.msgSnippet: As someone who is new to the idea of unschooling, I just read Nancy Wallace s book and found it very interesting but I too think that it s overwhelming.  I
messages.messageBody:
As someone who is new to the idea of unschooling, I just read Nancy Wallace's
book and found it very interesting but I too think that it's overwhelming. I
can't see either of my children ever writing operas, etc. But my son is very
good at playing in the sandbox and building forts with the couch cushions!
It really was an inspiration though of how it could be. Thanks for everyone
who recommended it. My next book to tackle is Valerie Fitzenreiter...maybe I
can find time over the holidays!
Amanda B


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
